document_data.name: Shajar
document_data.mainbody: '''Shajar''' lived on the island of [[Kaff]] in the [[Djinni's Claws]] in [[1367 DR]].[[Kaff]]
document_data.Description: Shajar possessed a rare combination of beauty that matched her wondrous spirit.
document_data.Relationships: Shajar was the slave of [[Alim Baybars]] and [[Melisende Baybars]].
document_data.History: She was the daughter of a desert chieftain who taught her some skill with a blade. She was suited to rule her father's tribe, but [[Fate]] had other plans. She was captured by slavers and sold to the sultan of the [[Pearl Coast]] where she lived in his harim. She was eventually sold to a prince on the island of [[Harab]] but the ship carrying her was attacked en route by [[Corsair (kit)|corsairs]]. The corsairs were then attacked by the [[ghoul]] pirates of Kaff and she was taken to Alim Baybars.
